title: DOVETAILED WORK; TENONS; SLOTTING MACHINES FOR WOOD OR SIMILAR MATERIAL; NAILING OR STAPLING MACHINES  (hand-held nailing or stapling tools B25C; manufacture of cases, trunks or boxes from wood B27M3/34; connections for building structures in general, e.g. dowels for use in building constructions E04B1/38; jointing elements in general, e.g. dowels in general, F16B {; manufacture of long strips or planks by bonding together pieces of wood, e.g. by glueing, B27M3/0013})
special_rules: This subclass deals with machines and methods, not products per se.

title: Dovetailed work; Tenons; Making tongues or grooves  (slotting B27F5/00); Groove- and- tongue jointed work; Finger- joints  (machines or devices for working mitred joints B27G5/00; cutting tools for cutting grooves or tenons B27G13/14)

Machines for inserting dowels, with or without drilling equipment  (manufacture of wooden dowels B27M3/28 {; dowels F16B; for use in building constructions E04B1/38; drills for making holes for dowels})
Slotted or mortised work  (hand mortising chisels B25D3/00)
definition_statement: This place covers: Machines and methods for slotting or mortising, so not products per se.

title: Nailing or stapling; Nailed or stapled work
definition_statement: This place covers: Machines and methods for nailing or stapling, so not prodcucts per se.
